titles.title: Navigating to Success Act
Navigating to Success Act
To amend the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act to clarify the career services provided to adults and dislocated workers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Navigating to Success Act
This bill includes certain activities such as diagnostic skills assessments and information on skills development programs within the provision of career services for adults under local workforce training programs.
